channel.title: Tab question
channel.description:
Ok, I posted this in server help because I thought this was sever-sided, but I figured out it isn't.
So.. I'm trying to do this: When the player presses the music tab (I edited it, it now has a bank symbol on it), a bank interface has to open.
Of course I know how to open the bank interface (server-sided), but I can't figure out how to know if the player presses the tab.
Normally switching tabs is all client sided, so I'll have to let the client send something to the server when the tab is pressed.
Can someone quickly explain me how I can do this?

item.title: Tab question
item.dc:creator: @VbCoder VbCoder
item.description:
@VbCoder wrote:

Nvm, I already did it (:

When the player clicks the music tab (= bank tab), the bank interface opens (:

But anyways, thank you for trying to help (:

Read full topic

item.title: Tab question
item.dc:creator: @dain_bramage dain bramage
item.description:
@dain_bramage wrote:

Whenever the tab is clicked client sided, it does not need to interact with the server at all. So there is no way of doing this, unless you set the tab to have a button, which when clicked, opens the interface.

Read full topic

item.title: Tab question
item.dc:creator: @VbCoder VbCoder
item.description:
@VbCoder wrote:

If you had read my post, you’d know that it won’t work, it isn’t server sided.

Read full topic

item.title: Tab question
item.dc:creator: @Ceo123 Ceo123
item.description:
@Ceo123 wrote:

That one is easy when you click the tab look on the server and it will say like actionbutton( then the ID) go to Buttonhandler or somthing and make the ID the Case and put the bank code in there

Case (ButtonID): (Bank Code); Break;
In Buttonhandler.java ^^^

Read full topic

item.title: Tab question
item.dc:creator: @VbCoder VbCoder
item.description:
@VbCoder wrote:

Ok, I posted this in server help because I thought this was sever-sided, but I figured out it isn’t.

So… I’m trying to do this:
When the player presses the music tab (I edited it, it now has a bank symbol on it), a bank interface has to open.

Of course I know how to open the bank interface (server-sided), but I can’t figure out how to know if the player presses the tab.

Normally switching tabs is all client sided, so I’ll have to let the client send something to the server when the tab is pressed.

Can someone quickly explain me how I can do this?
